title: Phase Rush removes Tahm's slow during champion Devour
body: Phase rush has removed Tahm's slow so much, and with the extra movement speed burst it gives, he is pulling champions further than {{champion:72}} could ever wish to; with less cooldown. There needs to be a coding change so that Tahm's movement speed goes back to the slow movement he had prior to preseason.

replies.body: yeah, that's the biggest problem we're facing right now, tahm kench...

That is hilarious and I hope they keep it.

Why is it bad if not every tahm wants to go resolve or inspiration primary?
